Package scrabble.model

Class Tile

java.lang.Object
scrabble.model.Tile
public class Tile extends Object
This class represents the tiles of the Scrabble game. Each tile can either be a blank tile or contain a letter, and it holds information about its score and location.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Tile

      public Tile()
      Creates a new, blank Tile object This tile has a score of 0 and an unset letter value. this letter value must be set at a future point to be a true representation of scrabble

    • Tile

      public Tile​(char letter)
      Creates a new Tile object from a letter
      Parameters:
      letter - the letter on the face of the tile. Must be an alphabetical character A-Z. The letter is automatically scored according to the rules of Scrabble, and as outlined in class TileScore

    • Tile

      public Tile​(char letter, Point location)
      Creates a new Tile object from a letter and location.
      Parameters:
      letter - the letter on the tile.
      location - the Point representing the tile's location on the board.

  • Method Details

    • setLetter

      public void setLetter​(char letter) throws NotBlankException
      If a tile is blank, its letter can be set once it is played
      Parameters:
      letter - the letter to put on the tile
      Throws:
      NotBlankException - when a non-blank letter is attempted to be set.

    • getLetter

      public char getLetter()
      Getter for letter
      Returns:
      the letter on the tile

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      getter for value
      Returns:
      the value of the letter

    • isBlank

      public boolean isBlank()
      getter for isBlank
      Returns:
      the value of isBlank

    • setLocation

      public void setLocation​(Point location)
      Sets the location of the tile on the board.
      Parameters:
      location - the new Point location for the tile.

    • getLocation

      public Point getLocation()
      Getter for the tile's location.
      Returns:
      the Point representing the tile's location.

    • setIsNew

      public void setIsNew​(boolean isNew)
      Sets the isNew status of the tile.
      Parameters:
      isNew - true if the tile is newly created (not played), false otherwise.

    • getIsNew

      public boolean getIsNew()
      Getter for the isNew status of the tile.
      Returns:
      true if the tile is new, false if it has been played.

    • getPoints

      public static Point[] getPoints​(Tile[] tiles)
      Utility method which extracts the points from a tile set
      Parameters:
      tiles - the tiles which have points set. All indices must be non-null; all tiles must have locations
      Returns:
      each point of the tile array, returned as an array of the same length.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
